question: Can you provide the nutritional benefits of kale and a simple recipe to prepare it?
true_answer: Information on nutritional benefits of kale and a simple kale salad recipe provided.

plan.current_objective: Complete nutritional research and recipe finding for kale

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Kale is high in vitamins A, C, and K; contains fiber, antioxidants, calcium, and iron.

steps.content: Can you provide the nutritional benefits of kale and a simple recipe to prepare it?
Creating initial plan: 1) Interpret query. 2) Decompose into research and recipe finding. 3) Assign to sub-agents.
Decomposing task into sub-tasks: nutritional research and recipe search.
Assigning nutritional research to researcher agent.
Searching for nutritional benefits of kale.
Nutritional benefits of kale: High in vitamins A, C, K, fiber, antioxidants, calcium, iron.
Updating plan: Mark nutritional research as completed.
Assigning recipe search to browser agent.
Searching for a simple kale recipe.
Simple kale salad recipe found: Ingredients include kale, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper.
Analyzing combined findings and providing feedback: Ready to compile final answer.
Kale is high in vitamins A, C, K, and offers fiber, antioxidants, calcium, and iron. A simple recipe: Mix kale, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for a fresh salad.
